cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 2 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

specialEventConditions.title: Christmas New Year 2025/2026
specialEventConditions.description:
CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR'S 2025/2026: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE. 
All bookings between 26th December and 2nd January are subject to a 7-NIGHT MINIMUM STAY. 
Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled. 
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures on 25th December, 31st December and 1st January. No check-ins or outs will be allowed on these dates. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 31st Oct 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
